src:
Spanska regeringen vill hjälpa Greta Thunberg
Spaniens regering erbjuder sig att hjälpa den svenska miljöaktivisten Greta Thunberg med resan till klimatmötet COP25 i Madrid.
02 Nov 2019, 17:53 by TT





Foto: FREDRIK SANDBERG / TT

text:
The Spanish government wants to help Greta Thunberg
The Spanish government offers to help the Swedish environmental activist Greta Thunberg with the trip to the climate meeting COP25 in Madrid.
02 Nov 2019, 17:53 by TT





Photo: FREDRIK SANDBERG / TT
